snippet: In response to a letter from Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, the board agreed to seek a new round of proposals for the sparsely populated western region.
abstract: New York State Gaming Facility Location Board will open new round of bidding for casino license specifically in Southern Tier region near Pennsylvania border.
lead_paragraph: In response to a letter from Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, the board agreed to seek a new round of proposals for the sparsely populated western region.

headline.main: New York Gambling Board to Reconsider a Casino for the Southern Tier
headline.print_headline: Board to Consider New Casino Bids

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York State Gaming Facility Location Board
